ShortDescription.Value: Allows you to easily change the max capacity of all transit depots

Publish.LongDescription:
## Depot Capacity Redux
- This mod allows you to easily change the maximum capacity of transit depots; how many vehicles each building can have. - Reduces the number of depots needed to save room in a city. - Options menu sliders can be adjusted in-game without restarting. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection, making it more compatible with other mods and less likely to break with game updates.
